title: Alexei Navalny’s Russian mourners also grieve for a democratic future
description: For many of those who trekked to his graveside, Navalny was Russia’s last democratic hope, at a time when the country was plunging deeper into authoritarianism.

title: As Gaza crisis intensifies, U.S. conducts first airdrop of aid
description: U.S. military cargo planes released packages containing 38,000 meals, where hunger is intensifying amid Israel’s military campaign against Hamas militants.

title: Dropping aid from planes is expensive and inefficient. Why do it?
description: The United States on Saturday became at least the fifth country to drop aid to Gaza since the start of the war in October.

title: Inside Ukraine’s last stand in Avdiivka and its ‘road of death’
description: Seven Ukrainian troops describe the intense final days before their withdrawal from Avdiivka, Russia’s biggest victory in more than a year.

title: Biden says Israel, Hamas ‘not there yet’ on cease-fire negotiations
description: After a chaotic aid delivery left more than 100 dead, Biden said the event would complicate efforts toward a cease-fire deal, which he hopes will come by Ramadan.

title: Biden authorizes aid drops into Gaza, as hostage deal remains in limbo
description: The humanitarian assistance comes in the wake of the deaths of more than 100 Palestinians in northern Gaza after a huge crowd swarmed an arriving aid convoy.
